Model class¶

Module scieconlib.gametheory.multi_agents.model

class Model(epochs: int = 1000, agent_copies_num: int = 1000)[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

This class defines a model for multi-agent RL in gametheory

Parameters

  • epochs (int) – number of training iteration

  • agent_copies_num (int) – number of agent set copies you want to make

abstract eval(rolling_res: list)[source]¶

Evaluate how to update the agent state by some rules. Should return a state for updating the agent

abstract property rolling_info¶

This method should return the extra information needed for an agent to take a roll, for example, epsilon value if using epsilon-greedy

Returns

some info object

Return type

any
